entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
